name: @scoping/scriptable
description: Write type-safe, concise, continuously-deployed Scriptable apps. Scriptable for iOS and iPadOS lets users author JavaScript procedures invokable by Apple Shortcuts, Share Sheet or Widgets, useful for home and device automation.

scripts.clean: cmd /q /c "for %G in (types dist build packed .svelte-kit) do (if exist %G rmdir /s /q %G) & for %G in (.eslintcache) do (if exist %G del /f /q %G)" || rm -rf types dist build packed .svelte-kit .eslintcache
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:stage && npm run deploy:replace
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run deploy:stage:clean && npm run deploy:stage:make && npm run deploy:stage:copy && npm run deploy:stage:filter
scripts.deploy:stage:clean: cmd /q /c if exist packed rmdir /s /q packed || rm -rf packed
scripts.deploy:stage:copy: cmd /q /c xcopy /e /k /h /i dist packed || cp -r dist/* packed
scripts.deploy:stage:filter: cmd /q /c if exist packed\tests rmdir /s /q packed\tests || rm -rf packed/tests
scripts.deploy:replace: npm run deploy:replace:header && npm run deploy:replace:resolve && npm run deploy:replace:space
scripts.deploy:replace:header: npm run deploy:replace:header:icon && npm run deploy:replace:header:share && npm run deploy:replace:header:strict
scripts.deploy:replace:resolve: npm run deploy:replace:resolve:extension && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:import && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export
scripts.deploy:replace:resolve:export: npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:default && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:default:as && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:module && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:named
scripts.deploy:replace:space: npm run deploy:replace:space:outdent && npm run deploy:replace:space:sandbox
